author: Guillermina Carro
title: Si tus relaciones no funcionan debes dejar de creer en este mito ya
text:
Si eres de los que ha pasado por muchas relaciones y ninguna ha durado, seguro que te habrás preguntado por qué te resulta imposible encontrar una pareja estable con la que compartir el resto de tu vida.
Es normal, a la mayoría le pasa, y pueden existir múltiples explicaciones para ello. Puede que no tengáis ciertas cosas en común (los valores, objetivos de vida, etc). Que no logres comunicarte bien con tus parejas, que no estés preparado aunque creas que sí… Pero hay otra respuesta que tal vez has pasado por alto.
¿Has tenido siempre una idea preconcebida de cómo debe ser una historia de amor? Si es así, los expertos en relaciones Karin Sternberg y Robert J. Sternberg han encontrado cuál puede ser tu problema principal a la hora de tener parejas estables.
Y es que resulta que muchos imaginamos cómo debería ser una relación perfecta para nosotros, la persona ideal con la que convivir, etc. Se puede basar en experiencias pasadas, en lo que hemos visto en casa o en otras personas, y también en lo que hemos visto en televisión y leído en libros.
¿El problema? Que muchos de esos ideales son mitos y por tanto resultan inalcanzables, o que lo que siempre has entendido por “perfecto” en la práctica no lo es, por lo que la “historia de amor” se transforma en “trampa de amor”.
Imagina por ejemplo que para ti una relación ideal es como la de tus padres, que siempre han hecho todo juntos, comparten las mismas aficiones, amigos, y a ellos eso les ha funcionado y han sido felices.
Así que tú buscas lo mismo, pero cuando lo encuentras te sientes agobiado porque en realidad prefieres algo más de independencia. Te encuentras con un problema porque no sabes qué falla si en realidad tienes lo que quieres, de ahí la “trampa”. Es por ello que necesitas analizar bien cuál es esa historia que has creado, qué es real y qué no, qué se ajusta a tus necesidades y qué no, qué cambios debes hacer… No es fácil ni rápido, pero te ayudará a encontrar a tu media naranja definitiva.

author: Andreia Takano
title: Núbia Oliiver critica atualização de rede social: 'Péssimo' - OFuxico
text: Núbia Oliiver critica atualização de rede social: ‘Péssimo’ Por [Andreia Takano](https://ofuxico.com.br/author/andreia-takano/) - 29/08/24 às 23:00 A Meta anunciou que, a partir de 14 de janeiro de 2025, os filtros criados por usuários deixarão de existir em suas plataformas, sendo permitidos apenas os filtros desenvolvidos pela própria empresa. A decisão gerou reações, incluindo a da atriz, modelo e criadora de conteúdos adultos, Núbia Oliiver. Núbia expressou seu descontentamento com a medida, destacando o impacto na liberdade de expressão dos usuários. “Acho péssimo toda vez que o Instagram limita a liberdade de expressão. Eu já perdi três contas por alegarem que estou infringindo as regras, o que não é verdade. Mais uma vez, eles limitam as pessoas, tirando a liberdade de criar o que elas querem,” comentou. [Festival de Veneza monta estratégia para evitar encontro de Brad Pitt e Angelina Jolie](https://ofuxico.com.br/cinema-e-serie/festival-de-veneza-monta-estrategia-para-evitar-encontro-de-brad-pitt-e-angelina-jolie/) Ela também mencionou as dificuldades que enfrenta ao divulgar seus conteúdos. “Parei de divulgar meus conteúdos de plataformas adultas porque minhas fotos sensuais continuam sendo derrubadas pelo robô do Instagram. É difícil trabalhar dentro da plataforma, mas mantenho a conta ativa por ser uma ferramenta de trabalho.” Apesar de continuar no Instagram, Núbia afirmou que a rede social perdeu importância para ela. “Instagram, para mim, já não tem a mesma relevância; hoje prefiro navegar nas concorrentes,” concluiu. Ela também espera que novas plataformas surjam, oferecendo menos restrições e mais liberdade de expressão.

author: 小浪财讯
title: 有色金属ETF（512400）跌0.53%，成交额3.81亿元|有色金属_新浪财经_新浪网
text:
8月14日，南方中证申万有色金属ETF（512400）收盘跌0.53%，成交额3.81亿元。
有色金属ETF（512400）成立于2017年8月3日，基金全称为南方中证申万有色金属交易型开放式指数证券投资基金，基金简称为南方中证申万有色金属ETF。该基金管理费率每年0.50%，托管费率每年0.10%。有色金属ETF（512400）业绩比较基准为 中证申万有色金属指数 收益率。
规模方面，截止8月13日，有色金属ETF（512400）最新份额为50.93亿份，最新规模为67.49亿元。回顾2024年12月31日，有色金属ETF（512400）份额为44.90亿份，规模为43.65亿元。即该基金今年以来份额增加13.42%，规模增加54.63%。
流动性方面，截止8月14日，有色金属ETF（512400）近20个交易日累计成交金额68.01亿元，日均成交金额3.40亿元；今年以来，150个交易日，累计成交金额300.90亿元，日均成交金额2.01亿元。
有色金属ETF（512400）现任基金经理为崔蕾。崔蕾自2019年7月12日管理（或拟管理）该基金，任职期内收益109.33%。
最新定期报告显示，有色金属ETF（512400）重仓股包括 紫金矿业 、 北方稀土 、 洛阳钼业 、 山东黄金 、 中国铝业 、 华友钴业 、 中金黄金 、 赤峰黄金 、 赣锋锂业 、 藏格矿业 ，持仓占比如下。 股票代码 股票名称 持仓占比 持仓股数（股） 持仓市值（元） 601899 紫金矿业 10.54% 2538.08万 4.95亿 600111 北方稀土 5.24% 988.22万 2.46亿 603993 洛阳钼业 4.92% 2742.25万 2.31亿 600547 山东黄金 4.81% 707.36万 2.26亿 601600 中国铝业 4.64% 3097.36万 2.18亿 603799 华友钴业 4.18% 529.69万 1.96亿 600489 中金黄金 3.54% 1136.65万 1.66亿 600988 赤峰黄金 3.45% 650.24万 1.62亿 002460 赣锋锂业 3.16% 439.86万 1.49亿 000408 藏格矿业 2.80% 307.96万 1.31亿

author: Correio Braziliense
title: Documentário sobre Milton Nascimento ganha primeiro teaser
text:
O teaser do documentário Milton Bituca Nascimento foi divulgado nesta quarta-feira (22). No material compartilhado, depoimentos de grandes nomes, como Caetano Veloso, Chico Buarque, Djavan, Spike Lee e Quincy Jones são apresentados ao público. A produção, que acompanha a turnê de despedida do cantor, capta momentos inéditos e emocionantes da trajetória do artista.
LEIA MAIS:
Milton Bituca Nascimento reflete sobre o impacto das composições do compositor, que com a sua simplicidade, conquistou fãs e provocou reflexões profundas. O longa será exibido, pela primeira vez, na Mostra de Cinema de Tiradentes, neste domingo (26/1) às 18h, em uma sessão ao ar livre.
Nos cinemas, a estreia oficial está marcada para o dia 20 de março. Dirigido por Flavia Moraes, o documentário seguiu por dois anos Milton Nascimento para retratar de uma maneira fiel a profunda conexão do músico com sua arte e seus fãs.
topics: Arts, Culture and Entertainment->arts and entertainment

author: EP
title: Boeing va a la huelga por primera vez en 16 años | La Rioja
text: Secciones Servicios Destacamos EP Viernes, 13 de septiembre 2024, 11:46 Necesitas ser suscriptor para acceder a esta funcionalidad. Opciones para compartir El sindicato de los trabajadores de Boeing en en la región de Seattle (EE.UU.) ha convocado una huelga por primera vez en 16 años y ha rechazado la oferta del fabricante para subir un 25% los salarios. Según recoge DPA, el 94,65% de los trabajadores votaron que no a la oferta que lanzó Boeing para evitar los paros, que contemplaba una subida salarial del 25% en cuatro años, mejorar en las coberturas sanitarias y las jubilaciones, dado que el sindicato IAM había pedido inicialmente un incremento del 40% en los salarios. Además, el 96% apoyó la convocatoria de huelga. La huelga ha comenzado a las 00.00 hora local de este viernes para unos 30.000 trabajadores. Los representantes sindicales han señalado en una rueda de prensa recogida por 'Bloomberg' que los puntos del acuerdo no eran lo suficientemente buenos y que la oferta no compensaba los 16 años de estancamiento salarial, el aumento de los gastos sanitarios y la deslocalización de miles de empleos sindicales. Por su parte, Boeing ha emitido un comunicado en el que muestra su compromiso para restablecer la relación con los trabajadores y el sindicato, además de volver a la mesa para alcanzar un nuevo acuerdo. Boeing atraviesa una crisis de reputación, de seguridad y económica desde 2019, cuando dos aviones 737 MAX sufrieron accidentes fatales. Tras esto, se han producido otros incidentes, como la caída de una parte del fuselaje de un avión de Alaska Airlines a principios de este año. author: Redacción
title: Avellaneda: lo chocaron, perdió el control del vehículo y atropelló a una mujer dejándola sin vida
text: El conductor de un auto fue chocado, perdió el control y trágicamente atropelló a una mujer causándole la muerte. Las impactantes imágenes captadas por las cámaras de seguridad revelan una serie de sucesos trágicos que desembocaron en la muerte de la mujer de 54 años, de nacionalidad peruana, mientras caminaba por una vereda en la localidad de Piñeyro, en el partido de [Avellaneda](https://www.elobservador.com.uy/nota/avellaneda-un-comisario-retirado-de-la-policia-federal-mato-a-un-delincuente-que-quiso-robarle-2024326174953), provincia de Buenos Aires. De acuerdo con informantes cercanos al caso, los hechos ocurrieron el pasado jueves, minutos antes de las 17 horas, en el cruce de las calles Mario Bravo y Oliden, en la zona sur del Gran Buenos Aires. La víctima transitaba por la vereda, casi alcanzando la esquina y siguiendo a otra persona, como se puede observar en el video difundido por el portal La Realidad Online. En ese momento, un Chevrolet Prisma blanco fue impactado en el cruce por un automóvil negro. El choque provocó que el Chevrolet subiera a la vereda. La persona que caminaba delante de la víctima logró esquivar el vehículo; sin embargo, la mujer peruana no corrió la misma suerte. El automóvil, sin control, continuó avanzando sobre las baldosas y la golpeó con la parte delantera, dejando su cuerpo debajo del vehículo. Fuentes policiales informaron que, al llegar el Servicio de Atención Médica de Emergencias (SAME) al lugar, la mujer se encontraba inconsciente, por lo que fue trasladada de urgencia al hospital Fiorito. A pesar de los esfuerzos de los médicos en la ambulancia, ingresó al centro de salud sin signos vitales.

author: Adam Bentz
title: Dennis Quaid's New True Story Movie Has Critics & Audiences Very Divided
text:
Dennis Quaid's New True Story Movie Has Critics & Audiences Very Divided Reagan By Adam Bentz Published 57 minutes ago Thread 2 Your changes have been saved
Email is sent
Email has already been sent

Manage Your List Follow Followed Follow with Notifications Follow Unfollow Share Facebook X LinkedIn Reddit Flipboard Copy link Email Link copied to clipboard Reagan Related
Genius Star Wars Theory Reveals Rey's Secret Force Power Can Tie Two New Movies Together
Where To Watch Reagan: Showtimes & Streaming Status
Star Wars Keeps Learning The Wrong Lessons From Lucasfilm's Failures Sign in to your ScreenRant account
Dennis Quaid's new movie, Reagan , has critics and audiences very divided. Directed by Sean McNamara, with a script written by Howard Klausner based on Paul Kengor's book, The Crusader: Ronald Reagan and the Fall of Communism , the film follows the life of Ronald Reagan from his childhood to his time as president of the United States, told through a conversation between two former KGB agents. Quaid stars as Reagan alongside Penelope Ann Miller, Robert Davi, Lesley-Anne Down, and Jon Voight in supporting roles.
Now, with reviews published and Reagan released in theaters, the film is fiercely dividing critics and audiences. On Rotten Tomatoes , Reagan has a 25% score from critics and a 97% audience score , recently renamed the Popcornmeter. These scores are only based on 28 reviews from critics and 50+ verified ratings from users, so they are subject to change over time.
Related Where To Watch Reagan: Showtimes & Streaming Status Ronald Reagan's life and presidency in America is the subject of Dennis Quaid's biopic movie, and there are options for where to watch Reagan.
2 Why Reagan Is Dividing Critics & Audiences What Are The Reviews Saying? Close As a former president with a deeply polarizing legacy, a film about Ronald Reagan is bound to be a divisive feat . The film was actually born out of controversy involving producer Mark Joseph, who was inspired to make his own biopic after the 2003 miniseries, The Reagans , was widely criticized by conservatives as an unbalanced and inaccurate depiction of the 40th president. Also, leading up to Reagan 's release, Facebook temporarily blocked the film from advertising on the platform since its ads were seen as an effort to sway the 2024 United States elections.
Your browser does not support the video tag. Already controversial leading up to its release, Reagan has received overwhelmingly negative reviews from critics , who describe the biopic as a shallow, hagiographic, and one-sided portrayal of Ronald Reagan. While a few reviews acknowledge Quaid's strong performance as the former president , they largely criticize the film's lack of depth and overly idealized depiction of Reagan. A few positive reviews highlight the film's appeal to conservative audiences, but still, the consensus is that Reagan is a plodding and superficial effort that fails to provide meaningful insight into its subject's life.
On the other hand, verified audience reviews on Rotten Tomatoes paint a very different picture , consistently praising the biopic for its portrayal of Ronald Reagan's life and presidency. Like critics, they highlight Quaid's exceptional performance in capturing Reagan's essence, voice, and mannerisms. Audiences describe the film as both a compelling biography and a nostalgic reminder of Reagan's impact on America, emphasizing his patriotism and leadership during the Cold War. With the film now playing in theaters, audiences can see Reagan and form their own opinions.
Source: Rotten Tomatoes

author: Liz Dye
title: Navarro Played Lawyer With Jan 6 Committee. But His Sentence Is Very Real.
text: Navarro Played Lawyer With Jan 6 Committee. But His Sentence Is Very Real. Stupid games, stupid prizes. Trump econ crank Peter Navarro reached the find out this morning in Judge Amit Mehta’s courtroom where he was sentenced to four months for contempt of Congress. Back in 2021, Navarro blew off congressional subpoenas relating to his work on coronavirus, which saddled the government with tens of millions of doses of hydroxychloroquine, citing a public exhortation by his former boss to “protect executive privilege and not let these unhinged Democrats discredit our great accomplishments.” Sponsored The Future Of Professionals Report: How AI Is The Catalyst For Transforming Every Aspect Of Work In 2022, the January 6 Committee subpoenaed him, about his efforts to block congressional certification of President Biden’s electoral college win. Navarro had publicly bragged about a scheme cooked up with Steve Bannon to disrupt Congress, and even wrote about it in a book where he dubbed the plot “The Greenbay Sweep.” Nonetheless, he told the Committee to pound sand, in a hilariously snotty letter penned without the assistance of counsel. “Please be advised that President Trump has invoked Executive Privilege in this matter; and it is neither my privilege to waive or Joseph Biden’s privilege to waive,” he wrote on March 1, 2022. “Accordingly, my hands are tied. Your best course of action is to directly negotiate with President Trump and his attorneys regarding any and all things related to this matter.” Even after he was indicted, Navarro vowed to continue representing himself, but eventually the Trump PAC took pity and fixed him up with MAGAworld lawyer Stan Woodward. And indeed, even today Navarro defended his decision to take on Congress pro se. “I’m a Harvard-educated gentleman, but the learning curve when they come at you with the biggest law firm in the world is very, very steep,” he complained to the court. Sponsored https://info.breakingmedia.com/how-160-legal-tech-decision-makers-are-combating-cybersecurity-threats How 160 Legal Tech Decision-Makers Are Combating Cybersecurity Threats https://abovethelaw.com/2024/01/how-this-law-firm-converts-4x-more-web-traffic-through-digital-transformation/ How This Law Firm Converts 4x More Web Traffic Through Digital Transformation Sponsored The Future Of Professionals Report: How AI Is The Catalyst For Transforming Every Aspect Of Work https://abovethelaw.com/2024/01/the-solo-small-firm-compensation-report-is-here/ The Solo & Small Firm Compensation Report Is Here! In the event, Navarro never produced evidence of any such invocation of executive privilege — to the extent that Trump could even assert privilege over Navarro’s extracurricular cahootsing with Bannon, who has been out of government since 2017. And anyway, the appropriate way to assert executive privilege was to show up and assert it like virtually every other White House employee did. Moreover, as Judge Mehta noted this morning, Navarro’s subpoena arrived three months after Bannon got indicted for refusing to comply with his own summons. So Navarro had ample notice that giving Congress the finger could be bad for your health. The court also had harsh words for Navarro’s legal team, who claimed a downward departure in the sentencing guidelines on the theory that their client had accepted responsibility by … forcing the government to take him to trial and then claiming in his sentencing memo that he deserved a light sentence because of undue political influence on his case. Last week, Woodward also moved to unseal documents in the replevin action the government to file after Navarro refused to return official documents located on his encrypted Proton Mail account. In this column, I speculated that Woodward was seeking to show Judge Mehta that his client was so brave and honest for turning over those documents (after being threatened with contempt). But, as independent journalist Marcie Wheeler pointed out, Woodward was actally after a cherrypicked quote suggesting that perhaps some of the documents at issue were covered by privilege and so … underpants gnomes? Here’s his supposed smoking gun from the government’s filings in the replevin action: Sponsored https://abovethelaw.com/2024/01/the-solo-small-firm-compensation-report-is-here/ The Solo & Small Firm Compensation Report Is Here! https://info.breakingmedia.com/the-state-of-small-law-firms-in-an-era-of-change The State Of Small Law Firms In An Era Of Change However, the United States has not taken the position that every action that Defendant took in connection with the 2020 Presidential Election was done in his personal, and not official, capacity; nor has the United States taken the position that any communications related to the 2020 Presidential Election are not Presidential records. From this, he infers the government’s “true motive – the prosecution of a senior presidential advisor of a chief political opponent.” He needn’t have bothered. In fact, the court was appalled by Navarro’s public statements, echoed by his lawyers in their pleadings, suggesting that the prosecution was being led by Biden and former House Speaker Nancy Pelosi. And so, after all this rigamarole, Navarro wound up exactly where Bannon is — sentenced to four months incarceration and hoping that he can stay out of jail long enough for Trump to get back in the White House and pardon him. Within minutes, Navarro had noticed his appeal to the DC Circuit. Delay, delay, delay. And if that doesn’t work, maybe he can get that guy Ron Vara to serve his sentence for him. US v. Navarro [Civil Docket via Court Listener] https://www.courtlistener.com/docket/63359365/united-states-v-navarro/ [Criminal Docket via Court Listener] Liz Dye lives in Baltimore where she writes the Law and Chaos Substack.

author: SoyChile
title: Castro avanza hacia la sostenibilidad a través de la instalación de colectores solares
text: El municipio de Castro ha anunciado un ambicioso proyecto de sostenibilidad que busca involucrar a los hogares urbanos en la instalación de colectores solares en sus techos. El objetivo de esta iniciativa es reducir el consumo de gas en un promedio de 8 cilindros de 15 kilos al año, lo que brindaría un ahorro significativo a las familias castreñas. Juan Eduardo Vera, alcalde de la comuna, ha destacado los beneficios tanto económicos como ambientales de este proyecto. Según Vera, los hogares podrían ahorrar hasta $200 mil pesos al año en gas, al tiempo que se disminuye la emisión de huellas de carbono. Para poder postular a este plan, los propietarios deben cumplir ciertos requisitos, como no tener una segunda vivienda y tener actualizado su registro social de hogar. La revisión de antecedentes y postulación se realizará exclusivamente en la oficina de Vivienda de Castro Municipio. Se espera que la instalación masiva de los colectores solares se lleve a cabo en la temporada primavera – verano 2024.
